name: Star Ocean: Till the End of Time
description:
Star Ocean: Till the End of Time is an action game developed by Tri-Ace and tri-Crescendo. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Square Enix. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Star Ocean: Till the End of Time on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 2.
Hajime Kojima and Yoshinori Yamagishi produced the game. Yoshiharu Gotanda directed the game. Motoi Sakuraba scored the game.
